VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Vintage?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Vintage is arc {Streetwear}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Streetwear?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Streetwear is arc {Vintage}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Sustainable Fashion} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Streetwear to Sustainable Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Streetwear to Vintage in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Streetwear and Sustainable Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Streetwear and Sustainable Fashion is {433}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Streetwear and Vintage in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Streetwear and Vintage is {69}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Vintage?
SC.A: The total flow output from Vintage is {382}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Vintage?
SC.A: The total flow input by Vintage is {411}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 347? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {433} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Streetwear}, a flow of {382} from {Streetwear} to {Vintage}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 253? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {193} from {Streetwear} to {Sustainable Fashion}, a flow of {69} from {Vintage} to {Streetwear}, a flow of {29} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Vintage}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 131 and 347? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {193} from {Streetwear} to {Sustainable Fashion}, a flow of {313} from {Vintage} to {Sustainable Fashion}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Streetwear to Sustainable Fashion or from Sustainable Fashion to Vintage?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {Sustainable Fashion} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Sustainable Fashion to Vintage, from Vintage to Streetwear, or from Streetwear to Vintage?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {Vintage} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Streetwear}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Streetwear} and {Sustainable Fashion}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Vintage, Arc Streetwear, Arc Sustainable Fashion}.
